scripts.precommit:run: [[ ! -z "$(git diff --cached ./$_target)" ]] && (npm --prefix ./$_target run precommit && git add -u ./$_target/package*.json) || echo $_target skipped
scripts.precommit:self: [[ ! -z "$(git diff --cached)" ]] && (npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add ./package*.json) || echo versioning skipped
scripts.precommit: npm run precommit:back -s && npm run precommit:front -s && npm run precommit:self -s
